name: Wolf359
0:
”Alexa, ask Wolf three fifty-nine for a deep space survival tip”
”Alexa, open Wolf three fifty nine and give me a tip”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: wolf three fifty nine
des:
Fans of Wolf 359 can now have Alexa contact Hera by pulse beacon relay. Hera can provide you essential deep space survival tips from the Pryce and Carter manual.

Remember, not only is memorising these potentially life-saving tips fun, it's also mandatory!

I am in no way associated with the producers, but if you are a fan, perhaps you would consider supporting the show. https://www.patreon.com/Wolf359Radio
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
